ranges.notes: Public holiday, many businesses closed. Winter sales (saldi) begin.
Winter season, fewer tourists. Good time for museums and indoor activities.
Public holiday marking the end of Christmas festivities and Luci d'Artista light installations.
Excellent shopping discounts throughout the month. Ideal time for museum visits and indoor activities. Potential for snow.
Winter season continues. Ski resorts in nearby Alps at their best. Quiet in the city.
Special menus at restaurants, chocolate-themed events in the city known for its chocolate tradition.
Local Carnevale celebrations, with the famous Battle of the Oranges in nearby Ivrea (dates vary). Last weeks of winter sales.
Early spring with gradually warming temperatures. Ski season still ongoing in nearby mountains.
Traditional pastries available in bakeries. Father's Day in Italy.
Spring begins, with parks starting to bloom. Easter preparations if it falls in March.

ranges.event: Holy Week & Easter (Settimana Santa - variable dates)
ranges.notes: Religious processions and events. Cherry blossoms in Parco del Valentino.
National holiday with parades and commemorations. Many museums free.
Excellent spring weather. Ideal for sightseeing and outdoor activities.
Public holiday, many shops closed but outdoor areas busy. Concerts and events.
Beautiful spring weather, perfect for exploring gardens and outdoor areas.

ranges.event: Salone Internazionale del Libro (Turin International Book Fair)
ranges.notes: Major cultural event at Lingotto exhibition center. City busy with literary events, author talks.
Start of summer with pleasant temperatures. Good for all outdoor activities.
National holiday with military parades and celebrations.
Excellent summer weather, long days, ideal for outdoor dining and exploring.

ranges.event: San Giovanni (Feast Day of St. John)
ranges.notes: Turin's patron saint celebrations with fireworks, parades, and special events. Very festive atmosphere.
High tourism begins as summer vacation season starts. Warm, pleasant evenings.
Peak summer, warm weather. Good for outdoor activities in mornings and evenings.
Major electronic music festival at Parco Dora. City energetic with music fans.
Open-air film screenings in the royal gardens. Summer concert series throughout the city.
Hottest month. Many locals leave for vacation. Some small shops and restaurants might close.
Major national holiday. Widespread closures. City quieter as locals head to mountains or coast.
Contemporary music festival in late August. City slowly returns to normal after Ferragosto break.
Excellent weather, warm days and cooler evenings. Full city life resumes after summer holidays.

ranges.event: Salone del Gusto / Terra Madre (biennial, even years)
ranges.notes: Major international food festival if scheduled (even-numbered years). City buzzing with food professionals and enthusiasts.
Beautiful autumn colors, pleasant temperatures. Excellent for sightseeing and hiking in surrounding hills.
First installations of the famous light art festival begin to appear throughout the city.
Public holiday, some closures. Traditional cemetery visits.
Italy's most important contemporary art fair at Lingotto. Art-focused events throughout the city.
Major film festival and light art installations fully visible. Cooler weather but culturally vibrant time.
Festive atmosphere builds, Luci d'Artista illuminations throughout the city.
Public holiday, official Christmas season start. Christmas markets open fully.
Markets in Piazza Castello and other squares. Beautiful light installations. Festive atmosphere.
Family time, many closures on 25th. Midnight Mass options.
Public holiday, continued closures, quiet day.
Period between Christmas and New Year. Winter activities, museum visits, and festive shopping.
Public celebrations in Piazza Castello or Piazza San Carlo. Restaurants offer special dinners (book well in advance).

scoreDescription.5: Excellent: Ideal conditions, significant positive events, pleasant weather, potentially moderate crowds
scoreDescription.4: Good: Favorable conditions, good weather, possibly some key events, manageable or festive crowds
scoreDescription.3: Average: Standard conditions, typical weather, potential for heat/closures (summer) or cold/snow (winter), moderate tourism or holiday peaks
scoreDescription.2: Below Average: Less ideal conditions, potential for closures (August), excessive heat, or consistent cold/wet weather
scoreDescription.1: Poor: Generally unfavorable conditions for typical tourism (rarely applicable to Turin)
